text:
>  They did the right thing despite not having a legal obligation to.

Speak for your country. Here in Australia they are legally obliged to provide refunds under certain conditions.

> It's baffling that Blizzard still can't listen to any other feedback besides OWL DPS players

Literally the problem. The game is balanced for 0.1% of the game population. What kind of fucked up logic is that.
